# Celestia Live Peers
Here is a list of active peers. Add them to your `config.toml` if you have trouble finding peers.
```
3247475e99137ea3a9158a07d3d898281f8c70e5@135.181.136.124:26656,e8906342e657ace92e1ed8599f0949da8dd75fbd@146.19.24.52:20656,a4a4e43dd641f1b921f76a02154846968024f744@95.111.235.247:26656,1d667e973e0dfcf0f92f7a202c241f5cfa6039cb@188.34.154.35:26656,5f7eeebf3d90344a6efeea95f8f260fe455b8096@46.4.23.42:36656,1afcd97b0bf289700378e18b45dc1f927917bba0@65.109.92.79:11656,1166d64ee61acbaa34cf6d4be99af60725549bb4@35.198.125.182:26656,77fe717fc70370c5b1782c136a5bf7ef1e1e7b5d@167.235.233.34:26656,a217dde054663543e4b68ace5267adbda3119ff9@65.109.92.28:26656,eec289755259106bf29266c401bace003289c6be@35.234.94.146:26656,70ad1e4808ad49f192f3536cf180aa22ca804fc6@34.88.189.48:26656,8084e73b70dbe7fba3602be586de45a516012e6f@144.76.112.238:26656,cc77755c7fed7457c6e33f6e65b0300e8fe9add0@5.161.109.144:26656,6dd7ccf76ee531a102f5f9e24b7cc521c9a01a28@65.109.85.170:37656,0d8b40858dcdf1e4370b2ed66b632bddf13a150d@75.119.143.147:26656,d1ef32ab00da8117731660fc30a2a800b642f6ad@34.141.57.183:26656,45f432d7ea5e4cbb25e945b8cc557df07bf4fcb6@65.109.92.26:26656,5ec7477a55b48984ec778bd1bef87d2ac8cf95eb@138.201.60.238:26656,7ff5fcd0e0db0518258b18bfd8cd5b45436dec2a@65.109.22.167:26656,3ad7f2d36f5e15d902c7aff7a305bea40f03f95c@163.172.111.148:26656,e286b562eddc6fea1b2635f6623430225666fb2f@147.135.144.58:26656,42b331adaa9ece4c455b92f0d26e3382e46d43f0@161.97.180.20:56656,1f243a32a4c741e6838f247350f0aa7655ea264e@173.249.40.87:26656,cb0db7a1fb8897c8eec9b09285e39d1756ed87b7@65.109.88.254:26656,1630a016ecf7232d6ca584e6628629b3deec63cf@65.21.95.15:11656,34a266af640b860be5272a7d02b6481e009581bb@54.39.128.229:26656
```

Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=3247475e99137ea3a9158a07d3d898281f8c70e5@135.181.136.124:26656,e8906342e657ace92e1ed8599f0949da8dd75fbd@146.19.24.52:20656,a4a4e43dd641f1b921f76a02154846968024f744@95.111.235.247:26656,1d667e973e0dfcf0f92f7a202c241f5cfa6039cb@188.34.154.35:26656,5f7eeebf3d90344a6efeea95f8f260fe455b8096@46.4.23.42:36656,1afcd97b0bf289700378e18b45dc1f927917bba0@65.109.92.79:11656,1166d64ee61acbaa34cf6d4be99af60725549bb4@35.198.125.182:26656,77fe717fc70370c5b1782c136a5bf7ef1e1e7b5d@167.235.233.34:26656,a217dde054663543e4b68ace5267adbda3119ff9@65.109.92.28:26656,eec289755259106bf29266c401bace003289c6be@35.234.94.146:26656,70ad1e4808ad49f192f3536cf180aa22ca804fc6@34.88.189.48:26656,8084e73b70dbe7fba3602be586de45a516012e6f@144.76.112.238:26656,cc77755c7fed7457c6e33f6e65b0300e8fe9add0@5.161.109.144:26656,6dd7ccf76ee531a102f5f9e24b7cc521c9a01a28@65.109.85.170:37656,0d8b40858dcdf1e4370b2ed66b632bddf13a150d@75.119.143.147:26656,d1ef32ab00da8117731660fc30a2a800b642f6ad@34.141.57.183:26656,45f432d7ea5e4cbb25e945b8cc557df07bf4fcb6@65.109.92.26:26656,5ec7477a55b48984ec778bd1bef87d2ac8cf95eb@138.201.60.238:26656,7ff5fcd0e0db0518258b18bfd8cd5b45436dec2a@65.109.22.167:26656,3ad7f2d36f5e15d902c7aff7a305bea40f03f95c@163.172.111.148:26656,e286b562eddc6fea1b2635f6623430225666fb2f@147.135.144.58:26656,42b331adaa9ece4c455b92f0d26e3382e46d43f0@161.97.180.20:56656,1f243a32a4c741e6838f247350f0aa7655ea264e@173.249.40.87:26656,cb0db7a1fb8897c8eec9b09285e39d1756ed87b7@65.109.88.254:26656,1630a016ecf7232d6ca584e6628629b3deec63cf@65.21.95.15:11656,34a266af640b860be5272a7d02b6481e009581bb@54.39.128.229:26656
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.celestia-app/config/config.toml
```
